article_title: Seattle Police Department CIO Greg Russell Leaves After 6 Months
article_text: Security and regulatory concerns have limited health care providers’ use of offshore IT services, but pressure to reduce costs is prompting them to find ways to leverage the offshore model while safeguarding sensitive data.

twitter.description: The department’s COO, Mike Wagers, confirmed Mr. Russell’s departure. A new CIO has been chosen and is undergoing background checks, and an announcement is expected this week.
twitter.title: Seattle Police Department CIO Greg Russell Leaves After 6 Months
